Easiest crypto wallet for everyone
cryptocurrencies and tokens

1000+

The private keys are generated and stored by the Toka EL6 chip. Each wallet can be duplicated for two or three cards.
Toka wallet —

Multicurrency hardware wallet

The private keys are generated and stored by the Toka EL6 chip. Each wallet can be duplicated for two or three cards.
100+

Tokens

< 3

up to 3 cards

Crypto banknote —

Crypto banknote with one currency

A simple single-currency wallet for buying, storing, selling and exchanging cryptocurrencies.
